text: being five days in the refugee trail now
and I'm absolutely knackered it's
mentally and spiritually exhausting
being been with refugees but the stories
of courage and humanity in some people
icity stick out in my mind we met a
fantastic not a yesterday we told me I
believed him he swam from Turkey to
Greece from Bagram to cause every end
she said was he going to do with the
money he saved the people smugglers 1200
euro it's going to spend it on drinking
all the way around we met a guy who's
from Dubai he's Syrian originally but I
don't think the guys are refugee last
night we rocked up in a refugee camp in
Macedonia now there's bureaucratic
processes and soap up and so on but what
we saw was a sea of humanity chewing up
in the middle of the night men women
children old ladies old man babies
queuing up so they could be processed
honestly in 2015 I thought your it was
better than that
